item.title: Treasury suspends penny production as convenience stores adapt to coin shortage
item.description: Major chains like Kwik Trip and Love's round cash transactions in customers' favor while advocating for federal rounding legislation

item.description: Convenience-store chain has seen 1% average fuel volume lift in the first 90 days
